= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.AVPV* || Anteroventral Periventricular Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Control sex-typical physiology and behaviors || Abundant of nuclear hormone receptors, sexual differentiation ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.AH* || Anterior Hypothalamic Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Thermoregulation, panting, sweating || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.PV* || Paraventricular Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Regulate appetite and autonomic functions || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.PO* || Preoptic Area || Excitatory Nucleus || Thermoregulation || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.SCN* || Suprachiasmatic Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || 24-hour rhythms || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.SO* || Supraoptic Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Blood volume or blood pressure || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.LT* || Lateral Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Thirst and hunger || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.DM* || Dorsomedial Hypothalamic Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Blood pressure, heart rate || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.VM* || Ventromedial Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Satiety || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.AR* || Arcuate Nucleus of Hypothalamus || Excitatory Nucleus || Regulation of growth, appetite and body weight || ||
|| *HTA.FD.HT.PN* || Posterior Nucleus || Excitatory Nucleus || Blood pressure, pupillary dilation || ||
|| *HTA.FD.PG* || Pituitary Gland || Hormone Nucleus || Release hormones by request from HT || Secretes most of the hormones, also known as Hypophysis ||
